Mandate: Investigate corruption allegations, recover stolen assets, and support prosecutions in the Economic and Financial Crimes Court.
TopPriorities: Bring high-value bribery and procurement fraud cases to trial.
Expand whistleblower protections and secure anonymous tips electronically.
Publish integrity dashboards tracing asset recovery flows.
ActiveOperations: Cross-border procurement fraud investigations in partnership with ZRA.
Live corruption risk scoring for supply chains using financial monitoring.
Integrity training for public officials and local councils.

RecentActions.Title: Recovered misappropriated public funds
RecentActions.Summary: Tracked fictitious suppliers and returned funds to government projects.

RecentActions.Title: Filed charges against corrupt officials
RecentActions.Summary: Presented evidence of procurement fraud in Economic and Financial Crimes Court.

Mandate: Investigate corruption allegations, recover stolen assets, and support prosecutions in the Economic and Financial Crimes Court.
TopPriorities: Bring high-value bribery and procurement fraud cases to trial.
Expand whistleblower protections and secure anonymous tips electronically.
Publish integrity dashboards tracing asset recovery flows.
ActiveOperations: Cross-border procurement fraud investigations in partnership with ZRA.
Live corruption risk scoring for supply chains using financial monitoring.
Integrity training for public officials and local councils.

RecentActions.Title: Recovered misappropriated public funds
RecentActions.Summary: Tracked fictitious suppliers and returned funds to government projects.
